title: Is Soraka getting a lore revamp considering warwicks old lore was changed?
body: Since warwick is now a chimera thing created by singed, do you think they are gonna changed soraka's lore or just replace warwick with a random person or new champ maybe?

replies.body:
My question is: will she finally have some sort of connection to Karthus in her lore? Feels weird how after all this time, they're both rivals and there's absolutely no indication as to why. 

NOTE: If I hear ONE MORE THING from the comments about "It's about their ults and themes contradicting each other" and all that BS, Imma turn into a windmill with all the tilt I'll get.
It's about their ults and themes contradicting each other

so is she going to be sols daughter since she's the "star child?"

i always wanted to know what would happen if a daddy great celestial dragon of dark matter and light and a mommy mythological vertical striped albino horned humanoid bipedal quadruped were to have a daughter of immense magnitude and grace in a holy matrimonial fantasy world and then be the savior of a realm causing said daughter to lose her divinity and memory.

not that im into watching or reading about celestial beings make babies or anything.

> [{quoted}](name=BLACK REALM GOD,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dW5PRXRQ,comment-id=0002000200000000,timestamp=2017-03-16T18:09:29.646+0000)

> mommy mythological vertical striped albino horned humanoid bipedal quadruped

Wow. Just, wow. Wonderful way of describing Soraka. You completely nailed it.
oh hey thats cool, didn't know riot people did stuff on boards unless it was an ama or something
Now it would be funny if it caused another lore conflict that forced a look at another champ

> [{quoted}](name=Jaredan,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=dW5PRXRQ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-03-15T21:58:01.025+0000)
>
> Yes.

Will Singed be getting his lore update once Urgot comes out?
yes, she'll get her Bio updated at least, since Warwick's lore doesn't mention Soraka anymore
Wouldn't mind if they just went back to the old lore, just with Singed in the role of Warwick during the Ionia-Noxus war. Assuming that's even still a thing.
Probably in the Ionian update since that's the region she's affiliated too.
